00007   DSOutputBuffer::DSOutputBuffer(
00008     DSAudioDevice* device,
00009     IDirectSoundBuffer* buffer,
00010     int length,
00011     int frame_size)
00012   {
00013     m_device     = device; // keep the device alive while the buffer exists
00014     m_buffer     = buffer;
00015     m_length     = length;
00016     m_frame_size = frame_size;
00017     m_repeating  = false;
00018     m_volume     = 1;
00019     m_pan        = 0;

00028   void
00029   DSOutputBuffer::play() {
00030     m_buffer->Play(0, 0, m_repeating ? DSBPLAY_LOOPING : 0);
00031   }
00032 
00033 
00034   void
00035   DSOutputBuffer::stop() {
00036     m_buffer->Stop();

00040   bool
00041   DSOutputBuffer::isPlaying() {
00042     DWORD status;
00043     HRESULT rv = m_buffer->GetStatus(&status);
00044     return (SUCCEEDED(rv) && status & DSBSTATUS_PLAYING);
00045   }

00048   void
00049   DSOutputBuffer::reset() {
00050     setPosition(0);
00051   }
00052 
00053 
00054   void
00055   DSOutputBuffer::setRepeat(bool repeat) {
00056     m_repeating = repeat;
00057     if (isPlaying()) {
00058       // reset the repeating status by calling Play() on the buffer
00059       play();
00060     }
00061   }
00062 
00063 
00064   bool
00065   DSOutputBuffer::getRepeat() {
00066     return m_repeating;
00067   }

00071   DSOutputBuffer::setVolume(float volume) {

00073     m_buffer->SetVolume(DSAudioDevice::Volume_AudiereToDirectSound(volume));

00108   void
00109   DSOutputBuffer::setPosition(int position) {
00110     m_buffer->SetCurrentPosition(position * m_frame_size);
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   int
00115   DSOutputBuffer::getPosition() {
00116     DWORD play;
00117     m_buffer->GetCurrentPosition(&play, 0);
00118     return play / m_frame_size;
00119   }
